General.Name: Saudi Real Estate Co.
General.Description: Saudi Real Estate Company, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate development company in Saudi Arabia. The company engages in the construction, maintenance, and operation of residential and commercial buildings for selling and leasing; and provides project, property, and facility management services. It also produces materials and equipment for construction and related works. In addition, the company is involved in the construction, extension, cleaning, maintenance, and operation of water, sewerage, and drainage networks; and construction of roads, bridges, tunnels, and earthworks. Further, it engages in the construction, extension, and maintenance of distribution networks and stations for electrical power and gas, and telecommunication networks and communication towers; construction and maintenance of public parks and irrigation systems, and dams; and maintenance and sale of prefabricated concrete. Further, it is involved in the maintenance and operation of hospitals, medical centers, and government and private clinics; and real estate investment activities, as well as provides electricity work, gardens, and parks maintenance services. Saudi Real Estate Company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al Akaria Plaza Center, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11481
